title: Prerendering static pages
contents:
mode_edit

预先渲染静态页面link

Prerendering static pageslink

Angular Universal 允许你预先渲染应用程序的页面。预先渲染是在构建时处理动态页面生成静态 HTML 的过程。

Angular Universal lets you prerender the pages of your application. Prerendering is the process where a dynamic page is processed at build time generating static HTML.

如何预先渲染页面link

How to prerender a pagelink

要预先渲染静态页面，要先向你的应用程序添加 SSR 功能。有关更多信息，请参阅 Universal 指南。添加 SSR 后，运行以下命令：

To prerender a static page make sure to add SSR capabilities to your application. For more information see the universal guide. Once SSR is added, run the following command:

npm run prerender

预先渲染的构建选项link

Build options for prerenderinglink

向应用程序添加预先渲染时，可以使用以下构建选项：

When you add prerendering to your application, the following build options are available:

选项

Options

详情

Details
browserTarget

指定要构建的目标。

Specify the target to build.
serverTarget

指定用于预先渲染的应用程序的服务器目标。

Specify the Server target to use for prerendering the application.
routes

定义要预先渲染的额外路由数组。

Define an array of additional routes to prerender.
guessRoutes

构建器是否应该提取路由并猜测要渲染的路径。默认为 true。

Whether builder should extract routes and guess which paths to render.Defaults to true.
routesFile

指定一个文件，其中包含要预先渲染的所有路由的列表，以换行符分隔。如果你有大量路由，则此选项很有用。

Specify a file that contains a list of all routes to prerender, separated by newlines. This option is useful if you have a large number of routes.
numProcesses

指定在运行预先渲染命令时要使用的 CPU 数量。

Specify the number of CPUs to be used while running the prerendering command.

预先渲染动态路由link

Prerendering dynamic routeslink

你还可以预先渲染动态路由。动态路由的一个例子是 product/:id，其中 id 是动态提供的。

You can prerender dynamic routes. An example of a dynamic route is product/:id, where id is dynamically provided.

要预先渲染动态路由，请从以下选项中选择一个：

To prerender dynamic routes, choose one from the following options:

  • 在命令行中提供额外的路由

    Provide additional routes in the command line

  • 使用文件来提供路由

    Provide routes using a file

  • 预先渲染指定路由

    Prerender specific routes

在命令行中提供额外的路由link

Provide additional routes in the command linelink

在运行 prerender 命令时，你可以提供额外的路由。比如：

While running the prerender command, you can provide additional routes. For example:

ng run <app-name>:prerender --routes /product/1 /product/2

使用文件提供额外路由link

Providing additional routes using a filelink

你可以使用文件提供路由以生成静态页面。如果你要生成的大量路由（比如电子商务应用程序的产品详细信息）可能来自外部源（数据库或 CMS），则此方法很有用。

You can provide routes using a file to generate static pages. This method is useful if you have a large number of routes to generate, such as product details for an e-commerce application, which might come from an external source (Database or CMS).

要使用文件来提供路由，请使用 --routes-file 选项和包含路由的 .txt 文件的名称。

To provide routes using a file, use the --routes-file option with the name of a .txt file containing the routes.

比如，你可以通过使用脚本从数据库中提取 ID 并将它们保存到 routes.txt 文件来生成此文件：

For example, you could generate this file by using a script to extract IDs from a database and save them to a routes.txt file:

/products/1 /products/555

当你的 .txt 文件准备好后，运行以下命令以使用一些动态值来预先渲染静态文件：

When your .txt file is ready, run the following command to prerender the static files with dynamic values:

ng run <app-name>:prerender --routes-file routes.txt

预先渲染特定路由link

Prerendering specific routeslink

你还可以将特定路由传递给 prerender 命令。如果你选择此选项，请确保禁用 guessRoutes 选项。

You can also pass specific routes to the prerender command. If you choose this option, make sure to disable the guessRoutes option.

ng run <app-name>:prerender --no-guess-routes --routes /product/1 /product/1
最后复查时间： 2/28/2022
